mapper.select:
select a.`id`, a.`customer_name` customerName, a.`customer_level` customerLevel, a.`customer_tel` customerTel, case when a.`customer_level`=1 then '省级代理' when a.`customer_level`=2 then '市级代理' when a.`customer_level`=3 then '特约代理' when a.`customer_level`=4 then '终端代理' when a.`customer_level`=5 then '普通客户' else '其他' end customerLevelName, a.`address`, a.`modify_time` modifyTime, a.`create_time` createTime from t_snack_customer_info a where 1=1
and a.`customer_name` = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.`id`, a.`customer_name` customerName, a.`customer_level` customerLevel, a.`customer_tel` customerTel, case when a.`customer_level`=1 then '省级代理' when a.`customer_level`=2 then '市级代理' when a.`customer_level`=3 then '特约代理' when a.`customer_level`=4 then '终端代理' when a.`customer_level`=5 then '普通客户' else '其他' end customerLevelName, a.`address`, a.`modify_time` modifyTime, a.`create_time` createTime from t_snack_customer_info a where 1=1
and a.`id` = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.`id`, a.`customer_name` customerName, a.`customer_tel` customerTel, a.`customer_level` customerLevel, case when a.`customer_level`=1 then '省级代理' when a.`customer_level`=2 then '市级代理' when a.`customer_level`=3 then '特约代理' when a.`customer_level`=4 then '终端代理' when a.`customer_level`=5 then '普通客户' else '其他' end customerLevelName, a.`address`, a.`modify_time` modifyTime, a.`create_time` createTime from t_snack_customer_info a where 1=1
and a.`customer_name` like concat('%',#{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit 0,10
